short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay ahead in EVE Online's Wormhole space with zKillboard Overlay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your EVE Online Wormhole intel gathering with the zKillboard Overlay. This tool integrates directly with zKillboard.com, offering real-time data overlays to help players monitor activity in wormhole systems. Key features include:

- Real-time data updates: Stay informed about player activity in your system.
- Seamless zKillboard integration: View stats without leaving your browser.
- Open-source and community-supported: Transparent and secure.

For details, support, and installation instructions, visit our GitHub repository: https://github.com/raph5/zkb-overlay
